tech_news.title: Google says attackers used 100,000+ prompts to try to clone AI chatbot Gemini - NBC News
tech_news.description: Google says its flagship AI chatbot, Gemini, has been inundated by “commercially motivated” actors who are trying to clone the chatbot.

tech_news.title: Samsung Display Intros “QD-OLED Penta-Tandem” Premium Technology Brand - Wccftech
tech_news.description: Samsung announced its new QD-OLED Penta-Tandem premium technology brand for its proprietary five-layer organic light-emitting structure.

tech_news.title: Mario Tennis Fever 1.0.1 update out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
Highguard’s developer reportedly lays off ‘most’ of its staff just over two weeks after launch - The Verge
tech_news.description: Highguard developer Wildlight Entertainment has laid off “most of the team,” according to a former staffer on LinkedIn. Highguard launched in late January.

tech_news.title: Blizzard Is Bringing The Warlock Class To Diablo IV: Lord Of Hatred, Diablo II, And Diablo Immortal - Game Informer
tech_news.description: You can play as the Warlock in Diablo II starting today as part of the new Reign of the Warlock DLC.

tech_news.title: Dangerous new spyware can take full control of iPhone and Android devices - TechSpot
tech_news.description: Security firm iVerify says it has uncovered a new spyware platform dubbed ZeroDayRAT, a tool designed to seize near-total control of a compromised smartphone. According to the...

tech_news.title: Apple’s Siri revamp reportedly delayed… again - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: While the new Siri was expected to launch with the upcoming iOS 26.4 update in March, now, the changes are expected to roll out more slowly over time, reportedly postponing some features until the May iOS update, or even until the release of iOS 27 in Septemb…

tech_news.title: Apple Stock Eyes Breakout As This Unseen Engine Unlocks Agentic AI - Investor's Business Daily
tech_news.description: Joining fellow Mag 7 member Alphabet on the Breakout Stocks Index, Apple stock takes aim at two buy points.

tech_news.title: Rules of mysterious ancient board game decoded by AI, scientists say - CBS News
tech_news.description: The aim of the "deceptively simple but thrilling strategy game" was to hunt and trap the opponent's pieces in as few moves as possible, scientists said.

tech_news.title: Microsoft says hackers are exploiting critical zero-day bugs to target Windows and Office users - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Critical security flaws targeting Windows and Office users allow hackers to take complete control of a victim's computer by clicking a malicious link or opening a file. Patch now.
